mapper.insert: insert into Property(Name,Type,Valid) select #{name},#{type},1 from dual where not exists ( select * from Property where Name=#{name})
mapper.update: update Property set Name=#{name}, Type = #{type} where id = #{id}
update Property set valid=0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, value,PID as propertyId from PropertyOption where PID = #{pid} and valid=1
mapper.insert: insert into PropertyOption(value,PID,Valid) select #{option.value},#{pid},1 from dual where not exists ( select * from PropertyOption where value=#{option.value} and PID=#{pid})
mapper.update: update PropertyOption set value = #{option.value} where PID= #{pid} and id=#{option.id}
update PropertyOption set Valid =0 where PID= #{pid} and id=#{option.id}
